itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: David Morgan Evans (21 April 1911 – 24 May 1941) was a Welsh rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1930s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Glynneath RFC and Neath RFC, as a forward, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Wales (Heritage № 156), and at club level for Huddersfield, as a prop, i.e. number 8 or 10, during the era of contested scrums.

response: * David Morgan Evans (1911–1941), Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer
